Others: Frankfurt Arena will host 5 matches during UEFA EURO 2024, including Belgium vs Slovakia on 2024-06-17.
The match will take place on June 17, 2024, at 18:00 local time (CEST).
Stadium gates will open 3 hours before kick-off.
Public transport is recommended as the most convenient, fastest, and most sustainable option for matchday travel.
Parking for cars will not be available at the stadium on matchdays.
A paid pre-sale of parking tickets at 3 public parking lots within walking distance of the stadium is available.
Professional cameras and cane umbrellas are not permitted inside the stadium.
Smoking, e-cigarettes, and heat-not-burn tobacco products are not allowed in the stadium.
Bags larger than A4 size wonâ€™t be allowed into the stadium.
A valid form of ID is required for entry.
No tickets will be available to purchase at the stadium.
Many EURO 2024 stadiums favour cashless transactions.
